name: Radio Simba
description: Radio Simba based in Uganda and broadcasting in Luganda. On air since June 1998. With transmission on 97.3 FM in Kampala and 92.1 FM in Mubende.

name: Bukedde FM
description: Guno mukutu gw'amawulire wamu n'okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nsonga ez'enjawulo. Okuwemula, okuvuma n'okukozesa olulimi oluvvoola tekukkirizibwa era obubaka bwonna obugwa mu kiti kino bujja kusangulwa wamu n'ababutaddeko okukaligibwa.

name: Crooze FM
description:
We are Western Uganda's Biggest Radio, Loud and Clear, Jam after Jam. Great Music Great Friends.
Vibrant youthful with urban appeal Radio station based in the heart of Mbarara town playing you the hottest Jams in town.

name: Galaxy FM
description: 100.2 Galaxy FM is Uganda’s latest and hottest dance hit station that has quickly become the favorite and preferred FM radio station for urban Youth in and around Kampala. With the best DJs in Uganda and the best comedy talent behind the microphone, fused with interesting characters both on and off air.

name: Akaboozi
description: Akaboozi 87.9 FM is a broadcast radio station from Kampala, Uganda providing News, Talk, Information, Education and Interactive programs.

name: CBS Radio Buganda
description: CBS Radio Buganda 89.2 is a broadcast radio station from Kampala, Uganda providing local music, news and entertainment in Luganda and occasional news bulletins in English.

name: HOT100 Kampala
description:
We run this town when it comez to urban radio. We are comedy and more ! Listen in, enjoy the music and have a good laugh. 

We have won best radio at the Buzz Teenz Awards for Four Years in a row. HOT100 Kampala's mostest Hip Hop and R'n'B radio station (100.9 F.M.)

name: Pearl of Africa Radio
description: Pearl of Africa Radio Ltd also known as Pearl FM is a News, Information and Edutainment broadcast station operating in the 107.90 MHz in the FM band.

name: Radio Pacis
description: Radio Pacis Mission Radio Pacis educates and informs while promoting the well-being of our community - “Providing Infotainment for our community” Infotainment is a combition of the words Information and Entertainment. It means educating listeners in an entertaining way: Radio Pacis is not only a radio station, but a means of education for the listeners. Topics include health, women's rights, domestic violence, agriculture, development, schools, family life, and children's programmes.

name: Radio Sapientia
description: Radio Sapientia 94.4 FM, the Source of Wisdom, is a Catholic-founded radio station, solely owned by the Uganda Episcopal Conference.

name: Beat FM
description: 96.3 Beat fm was acquired by 91.3 capital fm under the same management of capital Radio Ltd Uganda and re-launched in 2005.96.3 Beat Fm is the leading Luganda Language station in Uganda as various stead man group media surveys confirm.We broadcast to Kampala and greater Kampala and central Uganda and we target 30-40 years old with a female bias.The station plays a selection/mix of music that appeal to this age group. We talk about issues that are relevant to this age group as we have dominant personalities that address this group.

name: Voice of Teso
description:
Voice Of Teso has been on Air since 1998 and has grown from a municipal station to cover the entire Teso sub region and neighboring areas in the Eastern and Northern parts of Uganda as well. It is currently one of the most prominent brands under the Voice Media Group ( VMG ) with a lot of good will from both the clients and listeners of the radio due to its pronounced presence in the region.
	Show more

name: XFM 94.8
description: XFM 94.8 is an English radio station in Kampala Uganda that is part of vision group.[1][2] It is broadcast on 94.8Mhz in Central and 96.6Mhz in Western Uganda.In Western Uganda, Xfm covers a radius of 80 - 100km around Mbarara reaching areas of Mbarara Municipality, Ntungamo, Ibanda, parts of Mubende, Jinja and Kiboga.XFM 94.8 went on air on August 1, 2011.

name: Kasese Guide Radio
description: This radio has a variety of Christian programs aiming to benefit people of all ages in Uganda and Eastern parts of the Democratic Republic of Congo. It is connected to the Catholic Church (Diocese of Kasese).

name: Spirit FM
description: Spirit FM 96.6 headquarter is based in  Kampala, Uganda telecasting live transmission on genre Gospel in English language. It is covering all area of the country and surroundings. They have a powerful latest transmitter installed in the station. Spirit FM is music station that mostly target youth community. Its programs are popular in all african country. Its slogan is “Music for Life”. 96.6 Spirit FM Play awesome positive Soul Music and blend it with relevant local Content.

name: Touch FM
description:
95,9 Touch FM represents the future and uniqueness of commercial radio in Uganda. A market-led format, committed to positive change and urban community development by delivering innovative programming to a unique audience.

Our blend of Pop, Rock, Reggae, Blues, Soca, Soul, R&B, Dance, Sophisticated Jazz and “Real Oldies”, (a ratio of 70% music, 30% speech), coupled with intelligent presentation is what has been missing on Uganda’s radio dial for the discerning ear.

name: Dreamerz Voice
description: A conservative Christian radio station dedicated to preaching Christ Jesus, teaching His Word holistically and witnessing His signs, miracles and wonders. Our niche is: dream interpretation. a program that runs at 11:00 pm East African Time. At 2:00 PM East African Time: We run a healing, miracle and deliverance program called the: ACCESS HOUR hinged on God's Word and prayer of faith. During the course of this program we have witnessed the incredible power of God. Testimonies of financial breakthrough and healings of various diseases. You can not afford to miss out.

name: The Kulture Radio Station
description: Our presence is felt. From lyrical Hip Hop and rhythmic R/B to soul-stirring Gospel, provocative Talk/News and even Sports, The Kulture Radio Station is where urban listeners turn for entertainment, inspiration and information. Our listeners trust us. We’ve proven to be a community partner; always providing a mic to amplify the voice of the Youth. Our communities know our over 20 on-air talents not just as voices, but faces they see in the community engaging in the issues that impact the youth. We keep it real. From celebrity news and the hottest music, to politics and protest. We take our job seriously from the radio dial to digital/social. And from the car to a mobile device. We keep our audience covered 24/7. We aren’t going anywhere. Black culture is here to stay – and so are we.
